    • Method Detail

      • retrieveCourseCodes

        private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Course> retrieveCourseCodes(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
        Retrieves the course codes for all courses contained in the provided XML document. The method depends on the API provided by the following url. API för kurs- och programinformation
        Parameters:
        doc - The document for from which the course list is extracted.
        Returns:
        A hash map with key the string code of the course, and value an instance of the class Course.

      • updateCourseContent

        private static void updateCourseContent(Course course)
                                 throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                        org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        Creates a document with dom instances from an XML page. Reads the node list of the document and from each node it retrieves information about the course.
        Parameters:
        course - The course for which information are retrieved
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException

      • constructCourseURI

        private static java.lang.String constructCourseURI(java.lang.String code)
        Constructs the uri of the XML course page, as instructed by the following link. API för kurs- och programinformation
        Parameters:
        code - The KTH course code.
        Returns:
        the URI to retrieve the XML page of a given course.

      • retrieveCourseInformation

        private static void retrieveCourseInformation(org.w3c.dom.NodeList nodeList,
                             Course course)
        This function checks for the required data in element nodes and recursively in children nodes.
        Parameters:
        nodeList - The list of nodes in the XML page
        course - The course for which information are retrieved.

      • extractXMLElements

        private static void extractXMLElements(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                      Course course)
        The structure of the course XML page is a parent element "course" and its child elements. This functions identifies some of the child nodes, and extracts the corresponding data. It updates the information of the course object.
        Parameters:
        node - The xml element for which data are extracted.
        course - The extracted data are stored in the corresponding course.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
